channel.title: Setting up 508 (Mac)
channel.description:
I coded a server a little bit 4 years ago on a pc. I recently switched to a mac and i tested out running an old 317 server. Now im trying to run a 508 adter getting the 317 to work but im unsuccessful. I get errors when i try to compile the way i did on the old server.
[code=java]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)[/code]
Is there just some simple step im missing or are 5-8's incompatible with macs? Help me out mac users.
